CHAMPIONING 
EMPLOYEES 
AS OUR 
GREATEST ASSET
“At K&S our employees and the ideas they generate together help formulate 
our competitive advantage. We provide our employees with a wide range of 
opportunities to learn and grow, helping to unlock their potential in a mutually 
enriching way. Providing a safe working environment took on new meaning in 
2020 and we are proud of how our teams across the globe found innovative 
ways to deliver value to our customers, while keeping themselves safe and 
continuing to grow and learn in challenging new ways.”
- Lisa Lim,
Vice President of Global Human Resources
